name: StuckTogether
description:
Hello everyone!

This is my game for the GMTK game jam 2021!

I am a game development student that soon is going to start his second year of study.I have never participated into a game jam that took 48 hours and with everything going on in the background for me I was super happy to be able to finish a game! 

Every game jam I try and learn a couple of new things this was no different! I learned LineRenderer (although ended up not using it in the end) , I have learned how to make an cinematic intro, I learned how to use tilesets appropriately. I used two different player controllers to create a different platformer so one fish goes up and down the other left and right.

StuckTogether is a game about two fish that suffer from our negligence as a species as we throw more and more rubbish into our seas and oceans. Can you help them get separated and escape their perils?

I wanted to make a cute little game but also have a message following my last project that I completed in college.

So I hope you enjoy it and let me know your thoughts! I am sure I have 1000 bugs or more but I had fun making it!

WASD - are the controls or arrows!
